По сравнению с прошлым проектом Valve - CS 1.6, эта часть превосходит по многим пунктам (да, какие-то минусы есть (они есть везде)). Я бы даже сказал по ВСЕМ пунктам, но найдутся те, кто захочет придраться и внести своё мнение

CS: Source is alright, It's sort of a mix between CS 1.6 and CSGO in some way's. I grew up playing CS 1.5 then 1.6 then Condition Zero. When Source came out, most of my friend's just stuck to 1.6. CAL tournament's were still going on for 1.6 at the time and I never really got into Source. I've played it here and there and its alright, Like I said before. The mechanic's and gameplay are sort of like 1.6 but with a CSGO sort of feel to it (graphics wise). Game play is very different from CSGO imo. If you are used to CSGO you might have a little bit of trouble getting used to Source. But if you are an old school CS gamer like me that played the old 1.5 back in the day then Source should be fun, but not to exciting.

A neat Gmod expansion pack that manages to be fun on its own. It's not as dead as some people claim it to be as there are still people playing all over the world (yes, even Australia), so you won't have to deal with a high ping if you play online. 8/10
The Source engine provided CS with lots of improvements to the gameplay, to bad the game died fast. R.I.P CSS
The physical effect make me thinks it's better than CSGO
The best Counter Strike game also used for Gmod.
